verses.verse: Now it came to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H635>Esther<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> her <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H5975>apparel<s%>, and stood in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon his <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And it was <S%H4428>so<s%>, when the king <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%>, that she <S%H5375>obtained<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> held <S%H3447>out<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>sceptre<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>. So <S%H635>Esther<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H8275>sceptre<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> unto <S%H4436>her<s%>, What wilt thou, queen <S%H635>Esther<s%>? and what is thy <S%H1246>request<s%>? it shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> thee even to the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.

And <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, If it seem <S%H2895>good<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, let the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that I have prepared for <S%H6213>him<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Cause <S%H2001>Haman<s%> to make <S%H4116>haste<s%>, that it may be <S%H6213>done<s%> as <S%H635>Esther<s%> hath <S%H1697>said<s%>. So the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that <S%H635>Esther<s%> had <S%H6213>prepared<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H635>Esther<s%> at the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, What is thy <S%H7596>petition<s%>? and it shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%> <S%H1246>thee<s%>: and what is thy request? even to the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>performed<s%>.
Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H7596>petition<s%> and my request <S%H1246>is<s%>:

if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and if it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H5414>grant<s%> my <S%H7596>petition<s%>, and to <S%H6213>perform<s%> my <S%H1246>request<s%>, let the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for <S%H6213>them<s%>, and I will do <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> as the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H1697>said<s%>.

Then <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8056>joyful<s%> and <S%H2896>glad<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>: but when <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%>, that he stood not <S%H6965>up<s%> nor <S%H2111>moved<s%> for <S%H2001>him<s%>, he was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> against <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H662>refrained<s%> <S%H935>himself<s%>, and went <S%H1004>home<s%>; and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H935>fetched<s%> his <S%H157>friends<s%> and <S%H2238>Zeresh<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H5608>recounted<s%> unto them the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%>, and all the things wherein the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H1431>promoted<s%> <S%H5375>him<s%>, and how he had advanced him above the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Haman <S%H2001><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H635>moreover<s%>, Yea, Esther the <S%H4436>queen<s%> did let no man come <S%H935>in<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> unto the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that she had <S%H6213>prepared<s%> but <S%H4279>myself<s%>; and to-morrow also am I <S%H7121>invited<s%> by her together with the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
Yet all this <S%H7737>availeth<s%> me <S%H6256>nothing<s%>, so long as I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2238>Zeresh<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and all his <S%H157>friends<s%> unto <S%H6086>him<s%>, Let a gallows be <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%>, and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> thou unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> may be <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H935>thereon<s%>: then go thou in <S%H8056>merrily<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> unto the <S%H4960>banquet<s%>. And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%>; and he <S%H6213>caused<s%> the <S%H6086>gallows<s%> to be <S%H6213>made<s%>.
